[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/2665288.png” bottom_divider_style=”wave2″ bottom_divider_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_post_title meta=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_post_title][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” custom_margin=”62px|||||” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Grandstream Phones In South India

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FixLab is the best computer service in South India whose priority is to provide efficient communication in an IT infrastructure. Grandstream systems have eased the process of communication with clear end-to-end connections. With adaptability, readiness, and highlights of VOIP telephony, grandstream IP phones help to frame a better communication infrastructure.

Grandstream phones in South India enable you to work from any place or at any time. Grandstream phones have been universally adopted by businesses all around the globe. it provides cheap telecommunication capabilities with high quality technologies to empower businesses. IP PBX system is a reliable communication system with Grandstream IP phones in INDIA.

We supply a wide range of Grandstream phones and offer professional installation services across South India and the INDIA. Our team ensures a hassle-free setup and seamless integration with your existing communication systems.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/GRANDS.jpg” alt=”grandstream phones in South India” title_text=”grandstream IP phones INDIA” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/h3-bg-section-02.jpg” custom_padding=”7px||38px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/GP.jpg” alt=”Grandstream IP Phones In INDIA” title_text=”Grandstream Phones” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” custom_margin=”62px|||||” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Grandstream IP Phones In INDIA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We suggest Grandstream PABX/IP PABX for dependable and long-lasting IP phone systems in their offices. Grandstream IP phones are the best option for easy, secure, and effective business communication. When communication is made simpler, the work will be well organized and transferred comprehensively. When it comes to businesses, the best worldwide communication with Grandstream phone in South India enables to reach a greater audience.

We provide full support, including configuration and ongoing maintenance, to keep your system running smoothly. Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist with any technical issues.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Features Of Grandstream Phones

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

  1. Wide Compatibility: They are compatible with various SIP-based VoIP platforms and softswitches, making them a versatile solution for businesses with different phone systems.
  2. Power over Ethernet (PoE): These phones support PoE, which allows them to receive both power and data through a single Ethernet cable, reducing clutter and simplifying installation by eliminating the need for a separate power supply.
  3. Easy Provisioning: Grandstream phones are designed for straightforward setup and configuration, supporting protocols like TR-069 and DHCP Option 66 for easy provisioning.
  4. HD Voice Quality: Grandstream’s phones deliver crystal-clear sound with HD voice quality, enhancing communication clarity and reducing background noise.
  5. Advanced Features: Grandstream phones come with an array of advanced features, including:
    • Call Recording: Allows businesses to record calls for training or compliance purposes.
    • Call Forwarding: Redirects calls to another number or extension.
    • Call Waiting: Alerts you to incoming calls when you’re already on a call.
    • Conference Calling: Supports multi-party calls for efficient team collaboration.
  6. Busy Lamp Field (BLF): This feature enables users to monitor the status of other extensions, helping them quickly determine availability for calls.
  7. Call Park and Pick-up: Grandstream phones let you park calls and retrieve them from other phones within the same network, ensuring flexibility in handling calls.
  8. Do Not Disturb (DND): Temporarily disables incoming calls to minimize interruptions during meetings or focused work.
  9. Hot Desking: Supports hot desking, enabling employees to use any available phone on the network, ideal for businesses with flexible office setups.
  10. LDAP Integration: Grandstream phones integrate with LDAP servers, making it easy to access contact information for colleagues and clients directly from the phone.
  11. Call Transfer: The call transfer feature allows you to seamlessly transfer calls to other extensions or numbers, improving call handling efficiency.
  12. Missed Call Notification: Provides notifications for missed calls so you can quickly return them.
  13. Visual Voicemail: Offers a visual voicemail interface, simplifying voicemail management by displaying messages in a list for easy access.
  14. Softkeys: Customizable softkeys allow users to perform specific functions like accessing voicemail or transferring calls with a single press.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Grandstream’s IP phones offer a comprehensive, high-quality, and cost-effective solution for businesses upgrading to VoIP technology. With features like HD voice quality, PoE support, advanced call management functions, and seamless integration with various systems, they provide an efficient communication solution for modern business environments.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
